title: What actual evidence is there that Michel de Montaigne spoke Latin natively? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t think actual evidence is needed. In the early 60’s, I studied philosophy in Latin, attended lectures in Latin and even suffered a viva voce exam in Latin. Go back 400 years from then, fluent Latin was demanded from anyone who had any claim to culture or education. & that includes St Ignatius.
